original: GREETING
translation: 问好

original: Hey there. Are you looking for a job?
translation: 嘿。在找工作吗？

original: If so, the Mojave Express is always hiring couriers.
translation: 要找工作的话，莫哈维快递一直在招募新的邮差。

original: Yeah? What is it?
translation: 嗯？什么事？

original: <bark!>
It's important that you're relaxed for this next test. Please, have a seat.
translation: 你只有保持放松，我们才能开始下一项测试。来吧，请坐。

original: All right. I'm gonna say a word. I want you to say the first thing that comes to mind.
translation: 好吧。我先说一个单词。然后你告诉我你脑海中闪现的第一印象是什么。

original: Dog.
translation: 狗。

original: Here. These are yours. Was all you had on you when you was brought in.
translation: 给你。这些都是你的。你被送进来的时候，身上就带着这些东西。

original: I hope you don't mind but I gave the note a look. I thought it might help me find a next of kin. But it was just something about a platinum chip.
translation: 我看了一眼你的笔记，希望你别介意。我本来是想看看你有没有什么亲友，但上面只写了一则关于什么白金筹码的事。

original: Well. Welcome to you. You look tired from the road. Why don't you relax a spell, let this fine town take care of you?
translation: 欢迎你。你看起来刚经历了一段疲惫的旅程。不如在这个宜人的小镇里呆上一阵，调养一下？

original: Hey there. In from out of town, ain't you? Name's Dusty.
translation: 嗨。从外面来的，是吧？我叫达斯蒂。

original: It's about time a new customer showed up around here. Was getting sick of dealing with the same faces all the time.
translation: 可算是有新主顾来了。总是和那些老面孔打交道，我都要吐了。

original: {Male Player in Powder Ganger gear}I know {emphasis "all"}all the guys I did time with around here and you ain't one of them. Can't fool me with that Powder Ganger getup.
translation: {Male Player in Powder Ganger gear}我认识{emphasis "all"}和我一起驻守在这里的每一个人。靠炸药帮的制服可骗不了我。

original: {Female player in Powder Ganger gear}Okay, I know I wasn't serving time with no girl, or I'd have heard about it. You come to play with the Powder Gangers?
translation: {Female player in Powder Ganger gear}好吧，据我所知我们的人里没有姑娘，否则我一定会知道的。你是来给炸药帮找乐子的么？

original: {Male PC}Look at you, walking in here like you're one of us. Don't you know this is Powder Ganger territory?
translation: {Male PC}看看你，就这么大摇大摆地走进来，好像你跟我们一伙儿似的。你不知道这里是炸药帮的地盘吗？

original: {Female PC}Hey there, girlie. You here to party with the Powder Gangers?
translation: {Female PC}嘿，小妞。你是来找炸药帮寻开心的么？

original: Heard there was a new face around. I'm the doctor around here... sort of.
translation: 我早听说这儿来了个新面孔。我算是这里的医生……之类的。

original: Didn't know anyone would willingly walk into this place, not unless they were looking for trouble. What's your story?
translation: 如果不是找麻烦，一般人是不会来这里的。所以，你想干什么？

original: Dawes said he let somebody in. So, you going to give me a reason not to kill you and throw your body back outside?
translation: 道斯说他放了个人进来。你最好能给我个理由，不然我就宰了你，再把尸体扔出去。

original: I don't handle buying and selling for the Gun Runners. Talk to the robot in the kiosk near our factory.
translation: 我不负责军火贩子的买卖业务。去找我们工厂旁边那个亭子里的机器人吧。

original: You must be the one Doc Mitchell was patching up. The way I heard it, I didn't think you'd be walking out of that office.
translation: 你就是米切尔医生救活的那个人吧。我听说了你的事，还以为你根本走不出那间办公室呢。

original: I've got plenty of supplies for sale. Even got some weapon mods and special ammo - well worth the caps, if you ask me.
translation: 我这儿货源充足，甚至还进了一些武器模块和特殊弹药——要我说的话，绝对物超所值。

original: If you're hurting for caps, I've also got boxes of surplus ammo in the miscellaneous section. They're not great, but you get what you pay for.
translation: 如果你手头紧的话，我这里倒是还有几盒军需备用弹。虽然品质不怎么样，但一分钱一分货嘛。

original: Welcome back. I had hoped you wouldn't need to come see me again so soon. What can I do for you?
translation: 欢迎回来。我还以为你不会这么快就回来找我。需要我做点什么吗？

original: Look, Rexie, someone new's come to see us. {Sighs}Poor boy. He hasn't been feeling well lately. I'm the King. What can I do for you?
translation: 瞧啊，雷克斯，咱们有客人了。{Sighs}可怜的孩子，他最近一直不舒服。我就是猫王。你有何贵干？

original: You look new to Freeside, so here's a little advice, friend. Don't go past the south gate greeter without talking to it first.
translation: 你是第一次来自由城吧，给你个小小的建议，朋友。如果你要从南门的迎宾机器人身边经过，一定要先和它们打声招呼。

original: {surprised to meet player here}How interesting! You're the Profligate courier who's been of some assistance to the Legion.
translation: {surprisedtomeetplayerhere}真有意思！你就是那个帮助过军团的放荡邮差。

original: {surprised to meet player here}How interesting! You're the Profligate courier who's been of some assistance to the Legion.
translation: {surprisedtomeetplayerhere}真有意思！你就是那个帮助过军团的放荡邮差。

original: You're not one of my regulars. What do you want?
translation: 你好像不是我的老主顾呀。你想要什么？

original: Whoa. New guy.
translation: 哇哦。新来的小伙。

original: Whoa. New chick.
translation: 哇哦。新来的小妞。

original: I haven't seen you before - what brings you to the Great Khans?
translation: 我以前没见过你——是什么风把你吹到大汗帮来了？

original: I understand you dealt the NCR a crushing defeat at Forlorn Hope. I hope that trend continues.
translation: 听说你在飘零希望营地给了NCR致命的一击。我希望这个势头能保持下去。

original: That's why I've made a decision: I'm naming you my heir. When I die, leadership of the Great Khans will pass to you.
translation: 因此，我决定：我将立你为我的继承人。一旦我死了，大汗帮的领导权将交给你。

original: Let me ask you a question - what's the tastiest thing you've ever eaten?
translation: 让我问你个问题——你吃过最好吃的东西是什么？

original: That's close enough. What do you want with the Great Khans?
translation: 别再往前走了。你找大汗帮有什么事？

original: Nice outfit, but I know you're not one of us. What do you want with the Great Khans?
translation: 行头不错，但我知道你不是我们的人。你找大汗帮有什么事？

original: I like you, stranger. You've stood by us when not many would.
translation: 我喜欢你，陌生人。在众人离弃我们的时候，你选择了和我们站在一起。

original: #1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes.
translation: 和郊狼接触让你感觉好多了。

original: <bark!> {pups}
#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes.
translation: 和郊狼接触让你感觉好多了。

original: <bark!> {happy}
#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes.
translation: 和郊狼接触让你感觉好多了。

original: <panting>
translation: <喘气>

original: #1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes.
translation: 和郊狼接触让你感觉好多了。

original: <bark!>
#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes.
translation: 和郊狼接触让你感觉好多了。

original: <sniffing>
I have to go now.
translation: 我得走了。

original: <bark! bark!>
Wait here.
translation: 在这等着。

original: <bark!>
Stay, Dogmeat.
translation: 在这等着，狗肉。

original: Let's trade equipment.
translation: 我们来交换装备吧。

original: <bark!>
Enough about tactics.
translation: 不说战术了。

original: <bark!>
Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
translation: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

original: <bark!>
All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
translation: 好的，就这样。我们走吧。

original: <bark!>
Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 你的距离不错。让我们谈谈其他事。

original: <bark!>
Stay close to me.
translation: 紧跟着我。

original: <bark!>
Let's talk about how close you're following me.
translation: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

original: <pant pant>
translation: <喘息> <喘息>

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 让我们谈点别的。

original: <bark!>
That's all. Let's get going.
translation: 就这样。我们走吧。

original: <bark!>
I want you to change your combat style.
translation: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

original: {questioning aroo}<aroo?>
translation: {questioning aroo}<啊呜？>

original: Let's talk about your tactics.
translation: 我们谈谈你的战术吧。

original: {questioning aroo}<aroo?>
translation: {questioning aroo}<啊呜？>

original: Let's get going.
translation: 我们走。

original: <bark!> {happy}
translation: <吠叫！>（开心）

original: Let's get going, Dogmeat.
translation: 我们走，狗肉。

original: It's time for us to part ways.
translation: 我们该分道扬镳了。

original: {sad whimper}<whimper>
translation: {sad whimper}<呜咽>

original: I think we should travel together.
translation: 我觉得我们应该同行。

original: <bark! bark!>
translation: <吠叫！吠叫！>

original: Come on, Dogmeat. It's time to get going.
translation: 来吧，狗肉，该出发了。

original: We haven't met yet.
translation: 我们还不认识。

original: Oh, what am I doing? I got to thinking about making a good impression and plain forgot to tell you my name.
translation: 哦，瞧我多失礼啊，净想着给你留个好印象，反倒忘了告诉你我的名字了。

original: I'm Jeannie May. I take care of folks here at the motel. Long as they aren't troublemakers.
translation: 我是珍妮·梅。我负责照看汽车旅馆，确保住在里面的客人们不会惹麻烦。.

original: Well, I'm not from here.
translation: 好吧，我不是本地人。

original: No. No you're not, are you? Maybe you shouldn't go. Not just yet.
translation: 对，你不是。或许你不该走。至少不是现在。

original: You don't. Ever. You don't even think about it.
translation: 你永远也不可能加入，这事你就别考虑了。

original: Even if we did recruit trespassers, you're far too old for us. Your relationship to technology has already been perverted.
translation: 即便我们现在还招募外来者，你的年纪也太大了。你对科技的态度早就被外界的偏见所扭曲。

original: How do I join the Brotherhood of Steel?
translation: 我怎样才能加入钢铁兄弟会？

original: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
translation: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

original: {happy bark}<bark!>
translation: {happy bark}<汪！>

original: Yes, I'm sure.
translation: 是的，我确定。

original: <whimper>
translation: <呜咽>

original: That's some impressive weaponry. Where did it all come from?
translation: 这些武器真是上乘啊，你从哪里弄来的？

original: All Gun Runner merchandise is constructed on-site.
translation: 军火贩子的所有商品都在厂房内生产。

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: This is the New Vegas branch of the Gun Runners, supplying the wasteland with only the finest armaments since 2155.
translation: 这里是军火贩子的新维加斯分部，始于2155年，致力为废土提供最好的军火。

original: Where's your boss? He'll want to know you were hitting me up for freebies.
translation: 你们老大在哪？我要告诉他，你想从我这儿揩油。

original: Hey! No need, no need! I was just kidding!
translation: 嘿！别，别呀！我刚才开玩笑呢！

original: Motor-Runner's down in the Maintenance Wing. Straight through the door behind me, down the hall, down the stairs to the right.
translation: 轰鸣恶煞就在下面的维修区。直走穿过我身后的那扇门，经过大厅，再下楼梯右转就是了。

original: I was just kidding about tossing me some Psycho. So you don't got to say anything about that.
translation: 我刚才问你要疯狂药是开玩笑呢。你可千万不要乱说呀。

original: This is what I've been waiting to see! A big bad Khan bringing in the medicine! How about you toss some Psycho my way?
translation: 终于盼来了！有个大汗帮的人带来了药！你能不能甩几支疯狂药给我？

original: I'm not a Khan. I'm just dressed like one.
translation: 我不是大汗帮的人。只是穿得像而已。

original: Then what the fuck are you doing here? You looking to get killed? What the fuck?
translation: 那你他妈的来这里做什么？找死啊？什么毛病？

original: I'm just here looking around.
translation: 我只是随便看看。

original: [FAILED] Then I think you'd better find your way out before you get yourself hurt.
translation: [失败] 那我觉得你最好掉头回去，免得受伤。

original: [SUCCEEDED] I guess it isn't a secret. Yeah, the residents of the Vault are all dead. We killed them.
translation: [成功] 我想这也不是秘密了。没错，这座避难所里面的居民都被杀掉了，是我们干的。

original: Funny thing is, they just let us in. We didn't have to force the doors or anything.
translation: 好玩的是，他们居然就直接放我们进来了。都不用我们破门而入。

original: Can you tell me what happened to the residents here?
translation: 你能告诉我这里的居民发生了什么事吗？

original: You should talk to Sunny Smiles before you leave town. She can help you learn to fend for yourself in the desert. She'll likely be at the saloon.
translation: 在离开小镇之前，你应该去和微笑桑妮谈谈。她能教你如何在沙漠中生存。她应该就在酒吧里。

original: I reckon some of the other folks at the saloon might be able to help you out, too. And the metal fella, Victor, who pulled you outta your grave.
translation: 我想酒吧里其他人也能帮上你。还有把你从坟墓里拉出来的金属伙计，维克多。

original: Anyway, you ever get hurt out there, you come right back. I'll fix you up.
translation: 不管怎样，如果你在外面受了伤，可以尽管回来找我。我会替你疗伤的。

original: But try not to get killed anymore.
translation: 只是别再死第二回了。

original: Do you know anything about the people who attacked me?
translation: 你知道朝我开枪的人是谁吗？

original: The one in the fancy suit seemed to be calling the shots, that's as much as I know. Other folks in town might know more.
translation: 穿高档西装的那个人看起来像是老大，我就知道这些。镇里的其他人可能会了解更多。

original: Word of advice, though: if you ever catch up with him, watch out. The man's got cold eyes like a snake. Can't be trusted, I'd say.
translation: 不过还是给你个建议吧：如果你遇到他，一定多加小心。那个人的眼神就像毒蛇一样冰冷。要我说，绝对不能相信他。

original: Do you know anything about the man that shot me?
translation: 朝我开枪的那个人，你知道些什么吗？

original: I didn't see him or the men with him. You might ask around town, though. Could be someone saw which way they was headed.
translation: 我没见过他或者他的同伙。不过你可以去镇上问问，说不定会有人知道他们的去向。

original: Your best bet would probably be Trudy, the bartender at the saloon up the road. If anyone saw anything, she'd know about it.
translation: 你最好先去问问特鲁迪，她是路边酒馆的调酒师。如果有人看见，她肯定会知道的。

original: That'd be Victor. Curious fella. He's sort of odd. And I don't just mean 'cause he's a robot. I couldn't tell you much about him.
translation: 那就是维克多，奇怪的家伙，是那种怪人。不光因为他是个机器人我才这么说。关于他更多的事我也说不上来了。

original: He's real friendly, don't get me wrong. You just get the sense that ain't the whole picture. Just a feeling.
translation: 你别误会，他非常友好。但我总觉得他没那么简单。就是有种感觉。

original: Keeps to himself, mostly. You want to know more about him, you'll have to ask him yourself. He has a shack on the southern edge of town.
translation: 大部分时间他都独来独往。如果你想了解他的情况，可以自己去问他。他在镇子的南边有个棚屋。

original: Who was it that rescued me?
translation: 救我的人是谁？

original: How did you happen to find me?
translation: 你怎么会碰巧找到我的？

original: I was out for a stroll that night when I heard the commotion up at the old bone orchard. Saw what looked like a bunch of bad eggs so I laid low.
translation: 那天晚上我在外面闲逛，听到墓地里有骚动。我过去一看，好像是一群坏蛋，于是我就埋低了身子。

original: Once they'd run off, I dug you up to see if you were still kicking. Turns out, you were, so I hauled you off to the Doc right quick.
translation: 他们一跑掉，我就把你挖了出来，想知道你还有没有救。幸好你还有口气在，所以我就把你拖到了医生那里。

original: Thanks for digging me out of that grave.
translation: 谢谢你把我从那个坟里挖出来。

original: Don't mention it! I'm always ready to lend a helping hand to a stranger in need.
translation: 不客气！我总是会对需要帮助的陌生人伸出援手。

original: I need to get to Primm. Can you suggest a route?
translation: 我要去普瑞姆。你可以给我指条路吗？

original: Sure can. Take the road southeast out of town till it hits the freeway. Primm is the town with the roller coaster, straight south. Can't miss it.
translation: 当然可以。沿着镇外东南边的路，一直走到高速公路。普瑞姆小镇上有一台过山车，就在正南边。你肯定能找得到。

original: NCR patrols do a good job of keeping the highway clear, but I'd keep your gun where you can reach it easily. You never know who you'll run into.
translation: NCR的巡逻队把高速公路上的治安维持得挺不错，但我个人还是情愿把枪放在最顺手的地方。你永远想不到自己会遇到什么状况。

original: Off the road, you'll probably start running into hostile wildlife. My advice would be to stick to the highway when you can.
translation: 如果离开大路的话，你可能会遇到充满敌意的野生动物。所以我的建议是尽量走高速公路。

original: Do you know who those men were who attacked me?
translation: 你知道那些袭击我的人是谁吗？

original: Can't say that I'm familiar with the rascals. Some of the fine folks in town might be able to help you out with that.
translation: 我和那些恶棍可不熟。不过镇上的其他好心人也许能告诉你。

original: Do you know anything about the people who attacked me?
translation: 你知道是谁开枪打了我吗？

original: The leader was a New Vegas-type, typical city boy. He had a bunch of Great Khans with him, probably hired guns.
translation: 领头的是个新维加斯人，典型的城里小子。带了一群大汗帮的人，可能是他雇的枪手。

original: The Great Khans normally stay in their own territory way up northwest, on account of them being enemies with the NCR.
translation: 大汗帮的人一般都呆在西北边自己的领地里，因为他们现在正与NCR为敌。

original: I'm trying to track down the people who attacked me. Know anything about them?
translation: 我在追踪那些袭击我的人。你认识他们吗？

original: Not much, other than they're a bunch of freeloaders who expected a few rounds on the house. I was able to get them to pay up, though.
translation: 一群想吃霸王餐的杂毛，除此之外我也知道得不多。不过我还是逼着他们结清了账。

original: Of course, one of the Great Khans did knock my radio to the floor "by accident," and it hasn't been working since.
translation: 当然，有个大汗帮的人"不小心"把我的收音机摔到了地上，然后收音机就不能用了。

original: Do you know the robot that rescued me?
translation: 你知道救我的那个机器人吗？

original: I know that... thing... as much as anyone else around here. It mostly keeps to itself, which is just fine by me.
translation: 那个……玩意，我知道的也不比其他人多。它总是独来独往的，不过这样对我来说最好。

original: {Victor dead}Good riddance to it is all I have to say. Never liked having it around.
translation: 总算摆脱它了。我从来都不喜欢它。

original: Doc Mitchell said you could teach me to survive in the desert.
translation: 米切尔医生说你能教我沙漠求生技巧。

original: Yeah, I guess there's a thing or two I could show you.
translation: 对，我是可以教你一两样东西。

original: Meet me outside, behind the saloon.
translation: 来外面找我吧，就在酒馆后面。

original: Interested in sharing tips on surviving in the Mojave?
translation: 能分享点在莫哈维的生存技巧吗？

original: Yeah, I guess there's a thing or two I could show you. Sounds like you need all the help you can get after what they done to you.
translation: 对，我是可以教你一两样东西。听起来你还是挺需要帮助的嘛，毕竟受了这样的打击。

original: Meet me outside, behind the saloon.
translation: 来外面找我吧，就在酒馆后面。

original: Do you know anything about Victor?
translation: 你了解关于维克多的事吗？

original: The machine? Harmless, no matter what Trudy says. She thinks it's hiding something, but I think it's just a broken down relic with no place to be.
translation: 那个机器人？我不管特鲁迪怎么说，反正我相信它是无害的。她觉得那家伙有鬼，不过我认为它就是个出了故障又无处可去的老古董罢了。

original: Why can't your men look into this?
translation: 为什么不能派你自己的人去调查？

original: I've tried, but he can smell a King a mile away. Probably knows all our faces by now. He's not a stupid man, I'll give him that.
translation: 我试过了，但他大老远就能嗅出我们猫王帮的气味。也许他已经记住了我们每个人的长相。我必须承认，他并不蠢。

original: What I need is someone he won't recognize, which makes you perfect.
translation: 我要的是一个他不认识的人，而你是最佳人选。

original: So are you going to take the job or what?
translation: 所以，这活你到底干不干？

original: <bark!>
I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
translation: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

original: <bark!>
I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
translation: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

original: <bark!>
I have some medical supplies to drop off.
translation: 我带来了些医疗物资。

original: It looks like you took care of our short term supply issues. In thanks, you can have a discount on medical services with me.
translation: 看来你解决了我们短期物资供应的问题。为了表达谢意，你在我这里可以享受到医疗服务折扣。

original: Your work here in the Old Mormon Fort has been invaluable.
translation: 你为旧摩门要塞所做的一切是无价的。

original: As a representative of the Followers, I present you with your very own Lab Coat. Wear it well, and may it aid our cause.
translation: 我谨代表天启追随者向你赠送一件专属的实验室外套。希望你能好好珍惜，并为我们的事业做出积极的贡献。

original: Also, before I forget, here is a key to a safehouse you can use to rest if you happen to be in the area. I'll just mark it mark it on your map.
translation: 还有，差点忘了，这把钥匙可以打开我们的一间安全屋，如果你恰巧经过那附近，可以到里头休息。我会在地图上标记出它的地点。

original: Where can I find the rest of the Great Khans?
translation: 我在哪可以找到大汗帮的其他人？

original: Our main camp is up in Red Rock Canyon, but we don't allow just anyone to come in.
translation: 我们的大本营在红岩峡谷，不过那地方未经允许不得入内。

original: The NCR can't touch us there - too many places for us to ambush them. We see their scouts poking around once in a while, but they keep their distance.
translation: 在那儿，NCR奈何不了我们——地形对我们有利，想伏击他们很容易。我们偶尔会看到他们的斥候在周围晃悠，但都离得很远。.

original: I'm looking for some Great Khans who stole something from me in Goodsprings.
translation: 我在找大汗帮的人，他们在清泉镇偷了我的东西。

original: The only Khans this far into NCR territory is me and my crew, and I didn't steal squat from you.
translation: 我和我的手下是目前唯一潜入NCR领地内的大汗帮成员，我可没偷你什么东西。

original: Besides, even if some of my gang did steal from you, I wouldn't rat them out. Loyalty actually means something to the Great Khans.
translation: 另外，即便我的人真偷了你的东西，我也不会把他们供出来的。对大汗帮来说，忠诚是很重要的。

original: As far as I know, it's just me and my crew out here, and if it really was Great Khans who mugged you, they didn't come this way. I'd have seen them.
translation: 据我所知，这附近就只有我和我的手下，如果真有大汗帮的人劫了你的道，他们也没走这边。否则我早就看到他们了。

original: Who are the Followers of the Apocalypse?
translation: 天启追随者都是些什么人？

original: We arose from the Boneyards of Adytum years ago. Since then, we have made it our mission to rebuild the wasteland and reeducate its inhabitants.
translation: 我们数年前起源于内城的埋骨地。从那时起，我们就把重建废土和教化人民视为己任。

original: We hope to forge a brave new world free of war and poverty by sharing knowledge and resources. Our primary goal is the free exchange of ideas.
translation: 我们希望通过知识和资源的共享，创建一个没有战争和贫穷的新世界。我们的主要目标是让人们的思想可以自由交换。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: {Amused}You march all the way out to Red Rock Canyon, enter my home as bold as you please, and you have no idea who I am? You've got guts, I'll give you that.
translation: {Amused}你跑了那么远来红岩峡谷，肆无忌惮地闯进我家里，却不知道我是谁？你真有种，我很佩服。

original: Well, then, let me educate you: I am the chief of the Great Khans - the Khan of Khans, if you like. This is my tribe and these are my people.
translation: 那么我来告诉你吧：我是大汗帮的酋长——也可以说，是天之可汗。这是我的部落，而他们是我的子民。

original: Name's Regis - I'm Papa Khan's advisor and right-hand man. I'm also the chief enforcer of the tribe's laws - so watch your behavior.
translation: 我叫雷吉斯，我是父汗的顾问和左臂右膀，也是部落的首席执法官——所以你最好注意自己的言行。

original: That sounds wise. I wish you the best.
translation: 听起来很明智。祝你们太平。

original: That's why I've made a decision: I'm naming you my heir. When I die, leadership of the Great Khans will pass to you.
translation: 因此，我决定：我将立你为我的继承人。一旦我死了，大汗帮的领导权将交给你。

original: Thank you for hearing me out. I just want to do what's best for the tribe.
translation: 谢谢你听我说这些，我只想做对部落最好的选择。

original: The grave.
translation: 坟墓。

original: Huh. Well, in that case I take it back. You look pretty good, given the circumstances.
translation: 哈，既然这样，那我收回我的话。不过你的经历虽然惨，居然还是这样满面红光。

original: Who's in charge of the Gun Runners?
translation: 谁掌管着军火贩子？

original: Out here, we don't have bosses. Me, the gunsmiths, and the guards all know what we're supposed to be doing.
translation: 我们没有老板。无论是我、枪械师傅、还是警卫，我们都各司其职。

original: Working for the Gun Runners is a sweet job. None of us would dare screw it up.
translation: 为军火贩子效命是一份美差。我们没人会自砸饭碗的。

original: Any chance I could get a tour of the Gun Runner factory?
translation: 我能有机会参观一下军火贩子的工厂吗？

original: None whatsoever. Everything inside the fence is off-limits, and the guards have strict orders to shoot to kill.
translation: 不行。栅栏内是禁区，警卫们都有令在身，凡是擅闯者，格杀勿论。

original: A lot of our high-end weaponry comes from Pre-War military schematics. If our competition got a hold of them, it'd be bad for business.
translation: 我们的武器制造工艺大多都来自于战前的军方图纸。如果让我们的竞争对手知晓，那会对我们的生意非常不利。

original: Who are the Gun Runners?
translation: 军火贩子都是些什么人？

original: Makers of the finest high-grade weapons and ammunition in the wasteland.
translation: 是废土上最优秀的高档武器弹药制造商。

original: If you ever get your hands on a piece of sweet, deadly hardware, there's a good chance that it came from one of our factories.
translation: 如果你有用过保养良好、性能卓越的武器，那么十有八九都是由我们的工厂生产的。

original: NewsStory
translation: 新故事

original: A package courier found shot in the head near Goodsprings has reportedly regained consciousness and made a full recovery.
translation: 清泉镇附近被射伤的包裹邮差据报道已回复意识并完全康复。

original: What exactly is a Powder Ganger?
translation: 炸药帮到底是个什么帮派？

original: That's us. We got sent here to fix the rails and make some new ones, and for that we got to use dynamite.
translation: 我们就是炸药帮。我们被派来修理和建造铁路，所以要用到炸药。

original: Of course, dynamite works pretty good against caravan guards, too. So, that's what we do - rob and blow things up.
translation: 当然，炸药用来对付商队的警卫也很管用。所以我们专干这个，抢完东西后就把一切都炸上天。

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: This? This is - or was - the big house. The New California Republic Correctional Facility. Not much "correcting" went on here, just slave labor.
translation: 这里？这儿是——或者曾经是——班房。新加州共和国劳改营。但几乎不存在什么"改造"，只有奴役劳工。

original: One day, us prisoners decided to liberate ourselves. Killed the warden, killed the guards, took over the whole damn territory.
translation: 有一天，我们囚犯决定起义。我们杀死了监狱长和警卫，接管了这个该死的地方。

original: How did you all manage to escape?
translation: 你们大家是怎么逃跑的？

original: One night, there was a big explosion from the other cell block. I had no idea what was going on, so I took cover in my bunk.
translation: 一天夜里，有个牢区突然发生了大爆炸，我不知道出了什么事，就躲到了床底下。

original: When it was all over, the guards were dead and we were free. Most of the other prisoners scattered, but a few of us stuck around, obviously.
translation: 等骚乱平息后，我们发现所有警卫都死了，我们自由了。大多数囚犯都逃走了，只有我们这一小部分人留了下来。

original: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
translation: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

original: <bark!> {happy}
I'm a courier with the Mojave Express.
translation: 我是莫哈维快递的一位邮差。

original: Well, I don't got any work right now, sorry to say.
translation: 我现在手头没什么活，抱歉。

original: {edited line}I'll tell you whatever I can. Do you have a delivery order you can show me?
translation: {edited line}我可以帮你想想办法。你有没有送货单让我看看？

original: I lost a package I was supposed to deliver.
translation: 我遗失了一个包裹。

original: {sad whimper}[Dogmeat is overburdened and is having difficulty keeping up with you.]
translation: {伤心的呜咽}[狗肉负载的东西太多了以至于很难跟上你。]

original: I'm looking for a man in a checkered coat.
translation: 我在找一个穿着格子西装的人。

original: Sure, I know him. What do you want with him?
translation: 是啊，我认识那人。你找他干嘛？

original: This again? You gonna help me out with what I need, or not?
translation: 又来了？你到底想不想帮我？

original: Now about the man I'm looking for...
translation: 那么关于我正在追踪的那个人…

original: Okay, I'll tell you everything I know, like I promised.
translation: 好的，就像我之前保证的那样，我会把我知道的都告诉你。

original: The guy you're looking for, Benny, he was traveling with some members from my old gang. They were going to Boulder City.
translation: 你要找的那个家伙，本尼，他当时正和我老东家的几个哥们一起同行。他们要去巨石城。

original: I'm looking for a man in a checkered coat. Have you seen anyone like that?
translation: 我在找一个穿格子西服的男人。你们见过类似的人吗？

original: Well, he might've been wearing a fancy outfit, but he wasn't any kind of gentleman to me.
translation: 他穿的衣服确实很高档，可他看起来并不像是个绅士。

original: Had his nose stuck so high in the air, you couldn't see it above the clouds. City folk, they always think they deserve better than what they got.
translation: 他那盛气凌人的样子，感觉鼻子都快捅上天了。城里人嘛，总觉得自己能过上好日子是理所应当的。

original: Those hoodlums he was with seemed to know Manny for some reason. He's our daytime sniper, up in the dinosaur's mouth.
translation: 和他一起来的那些暴徒看起来认识曼尼。他是我们这儿的狙击手，白天会在恐龙嘴巴里执勤站岗。

original: Can't say I have, but we usually keep to ourselves down here. You might have more luck up by the motel.
translation: 不敢说我见过，不过我们这儿的人都很低调。说不定你在旅馆能打听到什么消息。

original: Maybe ask Jeannie May. Nothing happens in this town that she don't know about. She'll be up in the lobby, most days.
translation: 去问问珍妮·梅吧。镇子上的事就没有她不知道的。她白天应该都在大厅里。

original: Sure have. Camouflage, that coat was, trying to hide from extra terrestrials what can only see in black and white checkers.
translation: 见过。迷彩，那件大衣肯定是迷彩，为的就是迷惑那些只能看得见黑白格子的普通人。

original: But they're not fooled 'cause he forgot to put checkers on his face. I told him so and he seemed to take it to heart.
translation: 不过谁也没被骗到，因为他脸上没格子啊。我跟他说过这事，不过他似乎没怎么放在心上。

original: They stayed here a night, and was up by the dinosaur talking to the sniper fella with the moustache a couple of times.
translation: 他们在这儿呆了一整晚，还和恐龙嘴巴里一个留胡子的狙击手小伙聊了好一阵子。

original: Sure, but he didn't buy any souvenirs, if that's what you're wondering. Sounded like he didn't have his money with him.
translation: 见过，但是我可以告诉你，他一点纪念品也没买。听他意思是身上没带钱。

original: His friends seemed disappointed about it. Heck, I would be too, if I found such a fine store and left my money elsewhere.
translation: 他的朋友好像很失望。妈的，换成我也会失望，好不容易发现了这么一家好店，口袋里的钱却在别处花完了。.

original: Manny might know more about them. Thought he might've been friends with one or two of 'em. He's up in the dino mouth during the day.
translation: 曼尼可能知道得更多些。说不定他已经跟他们中的哪个人交上朋友了。白天的时候他一直呆在恐龙的嘴巴里。

original: No, but I've been laid up for a while now. Haven't been able to keep an eye on things like usual.
translation: 不，我好长一段时间没出房门了。没留意到周围发生了什么事。

original: It's a small town, though. I'm sure someone would've noticed somebody like that if they came this way.
translation: 不过镇子就这么大，如果真有外人经过的话，肯定会有人注意到的。

original: I've taken care of the Van Graffs.
translation: 我已经摆平了范格拉夫家族。

original: Well done. This is a small step in the right direction, but it's damn good to move forward again. Now, I believe congratulations are in order.
translation: 很好，虽然只是一小步，但起码我们是有所动作了。我必须要向你表示祝贺。

original: It is my honor to bestow up on you the title of Paladin of the Brotherhood, for your meritorious service in its name.
translation: 鉴于你为兄弟会所做的贡献，我很荣幸地授予你兄弟会圣骑士称号。

original: Normally, there'd be a ceremony and such, but everyone is too busy at the moment for such frivolity.
translation: 通常还要举行个仪式，但现在大家都忙得不可开交，实在是顾不得这些繁文缛节。

original: I can give you this, however. Your very own suit of power armor. We can't spare our best, but I had the knights assemble this one for your use.
translation: 不过，我还是要把这个交给你。你的专属动力装甲。虽然性能不算卓越，但为了能适合你，骑士们还是动了一番脑筋的。

original: In addition to the armor, I've given the order that all of our arms and equipment be made available for your purchase.
translation: 除了这身装甲，我还下令，可以向你出售我们所有的武器和装备。

original: Finally, while you are now a member of the Brotherhood, I cannot ask any more of you. I'm sure you have goals of your own outside these walls.
translation: 最后，既然你已经是钢铁兄弟会的一员了，我对你也没有别的要求了。相信你在外面还有未竟的目标。

original: You are free to come and go as you please, though I hope you'll return to us someday in a more permanent capacity.
translation: 你现在可以随意出入，但我希望有一天你能回到我们身边常驻。

original: I wish you the best, {outsider}outsid- {beat, catches himself}Brother.
translation: 祝你一路顺风，{outsider}外来… {beat, catches himself}兄弟。

original: Back when we were stationed at HELIOS, our scouts reported that a group was establishing itself in the area as a distributor of Pre-War weapons.
translation: 当年我们还驻扎在太阳神电站的时候，斥候曾报告说附近有一伙人在贩卖战前武器。

original: Our Elder at the time, Elijah, was too concerned with getting HELIOS running and fending off the NCR, so he ordered us to leave them alone.
translation: 当时我们的长老以利亚一心扑在太阳神电站上，成天想着如何让它运转，如何防止它落入NCR手中，所以他才命令我们不要理睬。

original: It's time that we correct that oversight, and show this region that the Brotherhood is still a force to be reckoned with.
translation: 我们必须纠正这个错误，让人知道兄弟会的力量依然不容小觑。

original: I want you to visit these weapons dealers, this Van Graff family, and make an example of them. Leave no one alive.
translation: 我希望你去拜访一下这个所谓的范格拉夫家族，拿他们开刀。不要留活口。

original: When the job is done, report back and I'll arrange for a team to clean up the site and retrieve the weapons.
translation: 事成之后再来向我复命。我会派小队前去清理尸体，回收武器。

original: Is there anything else I do to prove my loyalty to the Chapter?
translation: 还有什么能让我证明我对分部的忠诚？

original: I installed the device up at Black Mountain, as instructed.
translation: 我已经依照你的吩咐在黑山顶上装了发射器。

original: Yes, we've already started receiving telemetry from it. This will be a great help in our future efforts, and I thank you.
translation: 是的，我们已经接收到遥测信号了。这对我们今后的工作大有裨益，谢谢你。

original: Now then, it is my great honor to bestow upon you the title of Paladin of the Brotherhood, for meritorious service above and beyond the call of duty.
translation: 现在，我很荣幸地授予你兄弟会圣骑士的称号，以表彰你的卓越贡献，以及从中体现出的忠诚。

original: I'm afraid a formal ceremony was out of the question given our current state, but I hope this will make up for it.
translation: 恐怕以我们目前的条件，没有办法为你举行正规的晋升仪式，不过希望这件东西能够弥补你的遗憾。

original: I had the knights refurbish a suit of our power armor for your use. It's one of the earlier models, but it should serve you well.
translation: 我让骑士们为你修整了一套动力装甲。这套的型号有些旧，不过性能依旧良好。

original: I've also given the order that all of our equipment be made available to you, not just the more mundane arms.
translation: 我已经下令开放所有装备供你使用，不再仅仅是日常军备。

original: You're a member of the Brotherhood now, and your gear should reflect that.
translation: 你现在是兄弟会的一员了，今后也该穿得像我们一样。

original: Lastly, you will be allowed to come and go as you please. You've done so much for us that to do otherwise would be a crime.
translation: 最后，你可以自由出入。你为我们做了这么多事，我们可不能亏待你。

original: I just ask that you keep the Brotherhood's interests at heart in all your dealings. Remember that you will always have a home here.
translation: 我只求今后你能时刻将兄弟会的利益铭记心上。记住，这里永远是你的家。

original: As one of our patrols discovered, the mutants just to the northeast have become strangely violent in the years we were secluded.
translation: 我们的巡逻队发现，东北方的变种人在我们隐居的这几年里变得异常凶猛。

original: However, this turn of events could also be an opportunity. We mostly left the equipment of the communications array there alone, out of respect.
translation: 不过，这也可以视为契机。为了以防万一，我们曾将一整套通讯设备单独留在了那里。

original: As the inhabitants have now proven themselves hostile, no more respect will accorded them. Making their equipment fair game.
translation: 既然那里的居民已经不再友好，也就没必要对它们礼貌了。我们打算重新启用这套设备。

original: I want you to head up to the summit of Black Mountain and install this remote signal transmitter in one of their consoles.
translation: 我要你前往黑山山顶，在他们的控制台里装一个遥控信号发射机。

original: It will allow us to tap into the radar and other detection systems running there, assuming they're still operational.
translation: 如此一来，只要那里的雷达与探测系统还能正常运转，我们就能和它们进行连接。

original: If we're going to operate on the surface again, it would be nice to do so with as much information at our fingertips as possible. Good luck.
translation: 如果我们想重新在废土上有所作为，就必须尽量地搜集可用的情报。祝你好运。

original: Is there anything else I do to prove my loyalty to the Chapter?
translation: 还有什么能让我证明我对分部的忠诚？

original: Great! I think you'll love it. Nothing better than a nice stroll through the Mojave desert, right?
translation: 太棒了，我就知道你会感兴趣。没什么比得上在莫哈维沙漠穿梭，对吧？

original: As a new employee of the Mojave Express, you'll need to fill out some paperwork at our main office in the Hub.
translation: 作为莫哈维快递的新员工，这有些表格需要你填。

original: But don't worry, in no time, you'll be back on the road. We have a lot of delivery orders to Vegas lined up for you.
translation: 别担心，要不了多久你就能启程了，我们有很多运单等着你。

original: I can already think of one delivery order I think you'll be perfect for.
translation: 我知道有一件工作很适合你。

original: I'm interested in working for the Mojave Express.
translation: 我有意为莫哈维快递工作。

original: Business in Vegas has really picked up recently, and we've got some orders lined up that require someone familiar with the area.
translation: 在维加斯的生意最近正上升，我们堆积了许多运单需要熟悉当地的人来派送。

original: I'm afraid I can't say too much more, but our main office in the Hub will have more information for you if you're interested.
translation: 恐怕我说不了太多，我们在哈伯城的总部会有更多你感兴趣的信息。

original: Any delivery order in particular you got for me?
translation: 有什么运单给我吗？

original: Well I'll be here when you change your mind.
translation: 我会等你改变主意的。

original: Not interested.
translation: 不感兴趣。

original: Then allow me to explain our situation. This bunker is currently locked down, allowing no entry or exit, with you being one of the few exceptions.
translation: 那么请允许我解释一下目前的情况。地堡现在处于封锁状态，不允许出入，但你是例外。

original: In exceptional cases, teams are sent out to investigate sites or retrieve materials deemed too important to ignore.
translation: 特殊情况下，会派遣小队出去调查周边环境，或者寻找重要材料。

original: Three such teams have gone missing recently, and the news of their disappearance has not yet been widely spread to avoid undue concern.
translation: 最近，有三支小队失踪了，考虑到可能会引起骚动，我们没有公开这一消息。

original: In order to maintain the peace, and adhere to the strictures of the lockdown, I need to send someone else to discover what happened to them.
translation: 为了维护稳定，确保封锁顺利进行，我必须派一个人去调查他们的下落。

original: My Chapter was lost, and I would like to join yours. I'm here to serve the Brotherhood.
translation: 我的分部毁灭了，我想要加入你们分部，为兄弟会效忠。

original: That's reassuring. I'm a member of the Followers of the Apocalypse.
translation: 这我就放心了，我是天启追随者的一员。

original: This installation carries with it dangers that no one here has realized.
translation: 没人意识到安装的危险。

original: Take care what you do here, and who you listen to. Some things are best left buried with the old world.
translation: 在这儿可得千万小心，无论你做什么，或是听谁的。有些东西，还是让它永远尘封于历史之中吧。

original: I'm with the Followers. My interest here is scientific.
translation: 我和天启追随者是一起的，我只在乎科学。

original: Pleasure doing business with you.
translation: 很高兴和你做生意。

original: Ain't That a Kick in the Head
translation: 当头一枪

original: Walk to the Vit-o-matic Vigor Tester.
translation: 走到视动体能测试机旁。

original: Use the Vit-o-matic Vigor Tester.
translation: 使用视动体能测试机。

original: Sit down on the couch in Doc Mitchell's living room.
translation: 坐到米切尔医生的沙发上去。

original: Follow Doc Mitchell to the exit.
translation: 跟随米切尔医生到出口。

original: Run Goodsprings Run
translation: 清泉镇大逃亡

original: Kill Ringo.
translation: 杀死林戈。

original: (Optional) Shake down Chet for supplies.
translation: (可选)勒索切特来获得补给。

original: (Optional) Obtain Doc Mitchell's spare medical supplies for the Powder Gangers.
translation: (可选)获得米切尔医生额外的治疗粉补给。

original: Defeat the Goodsprings militia.
translation: 打败清泉镇民兵。

original: Let Joe Cobb know once you're ready to take over Goodsprings.
translation: 让乔·科布知道你已经准备好拿下清泉镇了。

original: Tell Joe Cobb that Ringo is dead.
translation: 告诉乔·科布林戈已经死了。

original: Plan your attack on Goodsprings with Joe Cobb.
translation: 和乔·科布一起组织对清泉镇的进攻。

original: Hand the spare medical supplies over to Joe Cobb.
translation: 将多余的医疗物资交给乔·科布。

original: Welcome To Fabulous New Vegas
translation: 欢迎来到魅力的新维加斯

original: Hood removed, Jessup waits to pistol whip
translation: 摘下兜帽，杰瑟普等着用手枪打你。

original: Jessup pistol whips the player
translation: 杰瑟普用手枪打了玩家。

original: Yuma Flats
translation: 尤马平原基地

original: You just recently worked a shift.
translation: 你刚刚结束一次轮班。

original: Work a Shift
translation: 轮班

original: Regulator
translation: 监管者

original: Contract Killer
translation: 契约杀手

original: Lone Companion
translation: 独行伴侣

original: Although Dogmeat does not take up a companion slot, he deals extra damage and has a chance to knockdown opponents when he is the only companion in your party.
translation: 狗肉不会占用同伴槽，但当队伍中仅有狗肉一名同伴时，它能造成额外伤害并且有概率击倒敌人。

original: Studying ants stimulates your mind!
translation: 研究蚂蚁使你头脑兴奋！

original: Myrmecologist
translation: 蚂蚁学家

original: Study
translation: 研究

original: Studying ants stimulates your mind!
translation: 研究蚂蚁使你头脑兴奋！

original: Myrmecologist
translation: 蚂蚁学家

original: Study
translation: 研究

original: Your mind is stimulated by the research.
translation: 研究使你头脑兴奋！

original: Scientist
translation: 科学家

original: Study FEV
translation: 研究FEV

original: Study (Mutant Animal)
translation: 研究变种动物

original: Study Feral
translation: 研究狂尸鬼

original: Study Botan
translation: 研究植物

original: Study Super
translation: 研究超级变种人

original: Study Insects
translation: 研究昆虫

original: Study Robots
translation: 研究机器人

original: Your mind is stimulated by the research.
translation: 研究使你头脑兴奋！

original: Botanist
translation: 植物学家

original: Study
translation: 研究

original:
You have been exiled from the Brotherhood of Steel. Your crimes against the Codex are unspeakable and unforgivable. Only the mercy of the Elder spared you from execution. Exiled from Hidden Valley and forbidden to return under penalty of death, you must now find a new path for your life.

+ Power Armor Training
- Vilified by the Brotherhood
- Shunned by the NCR
translation:
你被兄弟会放逐了。你违抗法典，犯下了不可饶恕之罪。只因长老的仁慈，你才免于被处决。面对永世不得返回隐秘山谷的禁令，你必须寻得一条新的出路。

+ 动力装甲训练
- 被兄弟会仇恨
- 被NCR躲避

original: Brotherhood Exile
translation: 兄弟会放逐者

original:
You are a simple settler in Primm, working odd jobs and occasionally delivering packages for the Mojave Express. It was a nice life until the NCR lost control of their prison and convicts overran your quaint town. You ran to the old Bison Steve Hotel to hide, but that proved to be a mistake. The hotel is overrun with convicts, and you'll need to figure a way out.

+ Accepted by Primm
- Start Trapped in the Bison Steve Hotel
translation:
你是一个普瑞姆居民，靠打零工和偶尔给莫哈维快递跑腿为生。你岁月静好的生活被NCR惩戒所的失控打碎了，宁静的小镇现已遍布逃犯。你躲进了野牛史蒂夫旅馆，不成想它随后被逃犯团团占据。你必须逃出去。

+ 被普瑞姆接受
- 被困在野牛史蒂夫旅馆中

original: Primm Resident
translation: 普瑞姆居民

original: After a long journey, you return to your humble farm to find it raided and your family dead. There is nothing left for you here, but bones and whithered crops. You can only hope your stash of caps hidden behind the oven in the trailer is still there.
translation: 旅行返乡后，你发现你不起眼的农场已被劫掠，家人惨遭毒手。满目疮痍，你已一无所有。你祈祷你藏在拖车炉子后面的钱袋还没被抢走。

original: Raided Farmer
translation: 遭劫的农夫

original: You own a small ranch in the southern Mojave. Life is, for the most part, quiet and simple. However, with more Legion parties crossing the Colorado River and pushing deeper into the Mojave, you're not sure what the future might hold. But, this ranch is yours, and no one's going to take it from you.\n\n+ Start with Wolfhorn Ranch as a player home
translation: 你在莫哈维南部拥有一个小农场，岁月静好。随着越来越多的军团跨过科罗拉多河，深入莫哈维腹地，未来充满了不确定性。但至少你还有这个农场，没人会把它夺走。\n\n+ 拥有狼角牧场

original: Rancher
translation: 农场主

original:
A recent graduate from the Boneyard Library, you have arrived in the Mojave on your first assignment as a Follower of the Apocalypse. The dire poverty prevelent in Freeside is more than you could have imagined, but you are here to help and eager to do your part.	

+ Start with the Educated Perk
+ Accepted by the Followers
translation:
你刚从晒骨地图书馆毕业，到莫哈维开始作为天启追随者一员的初次任务。笼罩自由城的极度贫困远超你的想象，你渴望着做出改变。

+ 拥有“知识分子”特长
+ 被天启追随者接受

original: Follower of the Apocalypse
translation: 天启追随者

original:
You were born into the Great Khans, "the sick man of the Mojave," as some like to call them. But still, they are your tribe. You impressed many during your initiation. It's clear you are eager to prove your worth and lead the Great Khans to glory.

+ Accepted by the Great Khans
+ Factionless Great Khan Outfit
- Shunned by the NCR
translation:
你生在已被嘲讽为“莫哈维病夫”的大汗帮中，但无论如何，这就是你的部落。你在入会仪式上的表现让族人们印象深刻。很明显，你渴望证明自己并引领大汗帮走向荣耀。

+ 被大汗帮接受
+ 拥有无阵营的大汗帮外套
- 被NCR躲避

original: Great Khan
translation: 大汗帮成员

original:
You're an alcoholic with no purpose in life. You spend your days wasting away in your room at the El Rey Motel. Not that you should venture outside. You've got Camp McCarran to your right, where NCR Troopers are waiting to evict you, and Fiends to your left, who are eager to commit all sorts of unspeakable acts against you. At least you have booze and a nice view of the Vegas lights.

+ Player home at the El Ray Motel
- Addicted to Alcohol
translation:
你嗜酒如命，漫无目的地在埃尔-雷汽车旅馆中虚度人生。这并不是说你就该出门冒险，毕竟，你的右边是麦卡伦营地中随时准备驱逐你的NCR士兵，左边则是恶魔帮，你不敢想象落到他们手上的下场。至少，你有酒，还有维加斯的灯火可供遥望。

+ 拥有埃尔-雷汽车旅馆房间
- 酒精上瘾

original: Wasteland Wino
translation: 废土酒鬼

original:
You are a Hubologist, AHS level 5, and have traveled to the Mojave under special orders from the Church in San Franscico.

+ Start with Alien Blaster
+ Can craft Alien Cells
- 25 percent of caps made from trading
are donated to the Church
translation:
你是一个哈伯教徒，AHS-5级成员。你受旧金山教会的密令前往莫哈维。


+ 拥有外星爆能枪
+ 可以制作外星电池
- 交易获得瓶盖的25%捐献给教会

original: Hubologist
translation: 哈伯教徒

original:
You are a distinguished expert in ant biology, having undergone extensive training under one of the world's most renowned scientists of myrmecology. You are so facinated by ants that you don't seem to notice when they are trying to kill you.

+ Start with the Entomologist perk
+ Can study dead ants
(rewards XP and boosts Intelligence)
- Ants are twice as likely to score a critical hit
against you
translation:
你是一个杰出的蚂蚁学家，曾在世界最著名的蚂蚁学家之一手下接受过长期训练。你太痴迷于蚂蚁，甚至注意不到它们对你的敌意。


+ 拥有“昆虫学家”特长
+ 可以研究死掉的蚂蚁
（奖励经验值并提升智力）
- 蚂蚁对你有双倍暴击率

original: Myrmecologist
translation: 蚂蚁学家

original:
You work at the Silver Rush for the Van Graff family. In fact, today is your first day! Just guarding the front door, but still, you're eager to work your way up the business. After all, you've always had a love for energy weapons.

+ Start with the Plasma Spaz perk
- Shunned by the Brotherhood of Steel
translation:
今天是你第一天到范格拉夫家族的银色冲击工作。工作内容只需要你当好门卫，但是你渴望着往上爬，能去满足自己对能量武器的痴迷。

+ 拥有“等离子怪客”特长
- 被兄弟会躲避

original: Van Graff Thug
translation: 范格拉夫暴徒

original: Scientist
translation: 科学家

original:
In comparison to much of the American wasteland, plant life in the Mojave is thriving and remains unmutated from the nuclear fallout the once engulfed the country. As a botanist, your trip to the Mojave should prove beneficial for your research.

+ Can study plants rather than harvest them,
rewarding xp and boosting your Intelligence
translation:
在整个美国废土中，莫哈维的植物尤为丰富，并且保留了核大战之前未变异植物的特征。作为一名植物学家，莫哈维之行想必会让你的研究受益匪浅。

+ 研究植物而非采摘，
奖励经验值并提升智力

original: Botanist
translation: 植物学家

original:
You're not sure what you love more, listening to music or turning radio dials. Perhaps it's the latter because whenever you see a ham radio, you feel compelled to turn it on. Most people may consider you a bit odd, but who needs them? You've got your cozy little trailer, good music, and plenty of radio dials to turn on and off all day long.

+ Start with the Lone Wolf Radio trailer as a home
+ Deal increased damage when listening to your pipboy radio
- Addicted to turning the dials of radios 
and hamradios (cannot be cured)
translation:
你对音乐和无线电旋钮有着不相上下的热爱。也许你喜欢后者更多一些，只要见到一台无线电，你就忍不住把玩它的开关。旁人大概觉得你很怪，但是管他呢？你有一辆舒适的拖车，美妙的音乐，以及堆积如山无线电可供你开关终日。


+ 拥有独狼电台拖车
+ 收听哔哔小子电台时增加伤害
- 对无线电开关上瘾（无法被治愈）

original: Lone Wolf Radio DJ
translation: 独狼电台DJ

original:
You are a rare expert in the manufacture and maintenance of energy weaponry, having studied the fabled manuals and processes of the ancient Yuma Flats Energy Consortium. Your operational knowledge of energy weapons would put the Brotherhood of Steel to shame, and everywhere you go, you find your expertise commands a high value.

+ Start with the Vigilant Recycler perk
+ Energy Weapons degrade at a reduced rate
- Non-Energy Weapons degrade at an increased rate
translation:
你是能量武器制造与维护方面的顶尖专家，你研习过传说中的尤马平原能源联盟的资料。在你对能量武器的理解面前，兄弟会都要汗颜。无论你将去向何方，你手中的技术都将发挥难以估量的价值。

+ 拥有“谨慎回收”特长
+ 能量武器损坏率降低
- 非能量武器损坏率增加

original: Yuma Flats Energy Technician
translation: 尤马平原能量技师

original:
You're a contractor with the Gun Runners and work shift at thier headquarters in Vegas. It's a good gig where you can spend your days reloading and cleaning guns.

+ Start with the Hand Loader perk
+ Guns degrade at a reduced rate
- Non-Gun weapons degrade at an increased rate
translation:
你是军火贩子的合同工，在维加斯总部轮班。每天保养枪械也不失为一种消遣。

+ 拥有“手装弹”特长
+ 实弹枪械损坏率降低
- 非实弹枪械武器损坏率增加

original: Gun Runner
translation: 军火贩子

original:
You are a Regulator and have taken a solemn vow to bring evil to justice no matter where it hides. You joined an expedition to the Mojave after hearing tales of a "city of sin" located in the desert.

+ As long as you have positive karma
you can collect fingers from evil characters you kill 
and turn them in for caps to the Regulator
at the 188 Trading Post
translation:
你是一名监管者。你曾庄严宣誓，要让邪恶无处遁形。一座沙漠中的“罪恶之城”的传说吸引你前往莫哈维。


+ 你的业为正时，可以收集恶人的手指。
交给188贸易站的监管者领取赏金

original: Regulator
translation: 监管者

original:
You live in Novac, making your living from scrapping and salvaging in the area. You're new in town and are enjoying life here so far although things have been getting stranger with talk of ghouls and "chupacabras."

+ Start with the Novac Motel Room
+ Accepted by Novac
translation:
你住在诺瓦克，以收废品为生。你刚来镇上的这段日子过得还不错，但是最近传言四起，谈论着尸鬼和什么“卓帕卡布拉（吸血怪）”。

+ 拥有诺瓦克旅馆房间
+ 被诺瓦克接受

original: Novac Settler
translation: 诺瓦克住民

original: You don't remember who you are or where you came from, but maybe that's not relevant information anyway.
translation: 你不记得你是谁，也不记得你从哪里来，也许这本就无所谓。

original: Nobody
translation: 你是？

original:
You are an employee with Littlehorn & Associates and recently traveled to the Mojave to set up a new branch in Vegas.

+ As long as you have negative karma
you can collect ears from high ranking, important,
or famous characters, and turn them in for caps
 to the Littlehorn Rep. at the Atomic Wrangler
translation:
你是首都废土的里特宏和助手的成员，你刚来到维加斯，致力于建立一个分部。


+ 当你的业为负时，你可以收集重要人物的耳朵，
交给原子牛仔的里特宏代表领取赏金

original: Contract Killer
translation: 契约杀手

original:
You are a citizen of Vault City, a shining bastion of science and civilization in the wasteland. You were sent to the Mojave to map out the vaults in the area. You're confident, perhaps overly so, in your superiority over the locals.

+ Start with all Vaults marked on your map
+ Start with the Sneering Imperialist perk
- Tribal and Raider enemies have an increased chance to land
critical hits on you
translation:
你是废土上科学与文明的闪耀堡垒：避难所市的公民。你被派往莫哈维，勘测当地的避难所。也许你对土著的优越感让你自信过度了。

+ 拥有所有避难所的地图标记
+ 拥有“帝国主义者的蔑视”能力
- 部落民和掠夺者对你的暴击率增加

original: Vault City Citizen
translation: 避难所市公民

original:
You are a chem addict living in Freeside. You have not prospects in life and most people don't view you as anything more than trash in the street. Not even the thugs in Freeside bother trying to rob you. They know you aren't carrying anything but empty jet inhalers.

+ Start with "Day Tripper" challenge perk
- Shunned by Freeside
- Addictd to Jet
translation:
你是个住在自由城的瘾君子。你对生活毫无期待，多数人也只当你是个垃圾。就连自由城暴徒都懒得抢劫你，他们清楚你身上除了空空如也的杰特吸入器，一无所有。

+ 拥有“一日游”能力
- 被自由城躲避
- 杰特上瘾

original: Chem Addict
translation: 药物上瘾者

original:
You are a raider. The scum of the wasteland. 

You have no gang. You have no tribe. You have no friends.

- Hated by Every Faction
- Enemy of Every Faction
translation:
你是个掠夺者，废土的渣滓。

你没有帮派，没有部族，也没有朋友。

- 被所有阵营厌恶
- 与所有阵营敌对

original: Raider
translation: 掠夺者

original:
You are a member of the Kings, the coolest gang in Freeside.

What more is there to say?

+ Accepted by Freeside
translation:
你是自由城最酷的猫王帮的一员。

还有什么好说的？

+ 被自由城接受

original: Kings Gang Member
translation: 猫王帮成员

original: While Arroyo is no longer the primitive tribe it once was, they still continue the tradition of selecting a young hero to venture forth into the wastes. The elders chose you and have sent you to the Mojave. Only you know what your quest is.\n\n+ Start with "Classic Pack" gear
translation: 尽管阿罗由已经脱离原始，其仍然保持着选中一名年轻人游离废土的传统。长老们选中了你，将你派往莫哈维。只有你知道你的任务是什么。\n\n+ 拥有“经典包”

original: Chosen One
translation: 获选者

original: You are a member of a forgotten and lost tribe of the Mojave. The lands have changed greatly since the days of your ancestors, with the old tribes of Vegas forgetting their traditions and new tribes pushing in from both the East and the West. As the Mojave has changed, you must decide whether you will change with it or keep to your ways.\n\n+ Start with "Tribal Pack" gear
translation: 你是莫哈维一个被遗忘的部落的成员，和你祖先生活于此的时候相比，莫哈维已经剧变。在维加斯的几个古老部落已经遗忘了他们的传统，而两个庞大的新部落正在东西两个方向上挺进。你必须决定，是保持过去的生活方式，还是做出改变。\n\n+ 拥有“部落包”

original: Tribal
translation: 部落土著

original: You work as a caravan guard, escorting traders and their brahmin along the old asphalt trails that cut across the Mojave desert.\n\n+ Start with "Caravan Pack" gear
translation: 你是一名商队护卫，沿着贯穿莫哈维沙漠的柏油路护送商人和双头牛。\n\n+ 拥有“商队包”

original: Caravan Guard
translation: 商队护卫

original: You're a mercenary, or simply a "merc" as some like to call you. Most of your contracts involve hunting down Fiends, Vipers, Jackals, and other vagrant gangs. Many have tried to kill you before you kill them, but none have succeeded so far.\n\n+ Start with "Mercenary Pack" gear
translation: 你是一名佣兵。你接的多数活都是猎杀恶魔帮、毒蛇帮、豺狼帮或是其它游荡帮派。许多人试图杀死你，但你总是快死亡一步。\n\n+ 拥有“佣兵包”

original: Mercenary
translation: 雇佣兵

original:
You are a member of the Vipers, a violent raider tribe that earns their living by robbing caravans and harassing travelers on Highway 95. Life has been hard for the tribe for many years, and the old faith has largely been cast aside. Nevertheless, many have taken to venerating the Nightstalkers found in the Mojave.

+ Allied with the Vipers
+ Start with the "Mile in Their Shoes" perk
+ Turn In Nightstalker Tails, Eggs, and 
Blood to Viper Leaders for caps
- Hated by the NCR
translation:
你是毒蛇帮的成员，你们整日沿着95号高速公路劫掠商旅。近年来，部族有衰退的迹象，许多人抛弃了部族的古老信仰，开始崇拜莫哈维的夜行兽。

+ 与毒蛇帮盟友
+ 拥有“夜行兽研究”特长
+ 给毒蛇帮头目上交夜行兽尾巴、蛋和血来换取瓶盖
- 被NCR厌恶

original: Viper Gunslinger
translation: 毒蛇帮枪手

original:
You run with the Jackals, a raider tribe that was pushed into the Mojave by NCR expansion. Since they've migrated into the area, they have been the blight of Interstate 15. The Jackals are known to be especially savage and are rumored to consume human flesh.

+ Allied with the Jackals
+ Start with the Cannibal perk
+ Can Turn In Human Remains to Jackal Leaders for Caps
- Hated by the NCR
translation:
你和豺狼们同行，你的部落被NCR的扩张逼到了莫哈维。你们自来到这里，就仿佛是15号州际公路的枯萎病。豺狼帮的野蛮臭名远扬，还有食人的传言。


+ 与豺狼帮盟友

original: Jackal Gang Member
translation: 豺狼帮成员

original:
To everyone else in the Mojave, the Fiends are a viscious gang of killers and addicts. To you, the Fiends are your family and your tribe. Your traditional rites just happen to involve copious amounts of psycho and jet.

+ Allied with the Fiends
+ Start with "Day Tripper" challenge perk
- Addicted to Psycho
- Hated by the NCR
translation:
恶魔帮是莫哈维公认的一帮嗜血瘾君子。但对你而言，恶魔帮是你的家，你的部族。只是你们的传统仪式碰巧需要致死量的疯狂药和杰特罢了。

+ 与恶魔帮盟友
+ 拥有“一日游”特长
- 对疯狂药上瘾
- 被NCR厌恶

original: Fiend
translation: 恶魔帮

original:
You're a wealthy Brahmin Baron, and you've ventured to Vegas in search of gambling and cheap thrills. As you step into Freeside, it's clear this is the kind of place where you need to guard your caps. Being wealthy has its perks, but you're well aware that a fat purse can draw unwanted attention.

+ Start the game with a lot caps
+ The more caps you have in your inventory, the greater the damage you deal.
- Conversely, the more caps you hold, 
the more damage you take.
translation:
你是一个富有的双头牛大亨，来莫哈维一掷千金，寻求刺激。当你踏入自由城时，你才意识到你必须雇佣保镖才能在这里安然无恙。有钱虽好，你也明白它会引来不速之客。


+ 拥有大量瓶盖
+ 你的伤害随瓶盖存量增加
- 你受的伤害也随瓶盖存量增加

original: Brahmin Baron
translation: 双头牛大亨

original:
You have spent your life hunting for Sunset Sarsaparilla star bottle caps and have so far managed to accumulate a sizeable collection. You are ruthless in your pursuit to unlock the Legend of the Star, robbing and murdering anyone just to have another star in your pocket.

+ Start with 15 star bottle caps
- Start with Very Evil Karma
translation:
你毕生都投入于搜集蓝星瓶盖，目前已有了可观的收藏。在解开蓝星之谜的征途上，你残酷无情地抢劫、谋杀，只为能在口袋里多放一颗蓝星瓶盖。

+ 拥有15个蓝星瓶盖
- 业为非常邪恶

original: Star Collector
translation: 蓝星猎手

original:
Some might call you an addict, but you prefer to call yourself Nuka Cola's biggest fan. In fact, your love of Nuka-Cola is what brought you to the Mojave as sought you out new flavors like Nula-Cola Quartz!

+ Start with the Nuka-Chemist Perk
+ Increased AP and Healing from Nuka-Cola Drinks
- You have an incurable Nuka-Cola Addiction
(cannot be treated by Fixer or Doctors)
translation:
有人会说你是瘾君子，但你更喜欢自认核子可乐狂热粉丝。实际上，你来莫哈维就是要寻找新的核子可乐口味，比如石英味！

+ 拥有“可乐化学家”特长
+ 核子可乐提供的动作点数（AP）和生命回复增加
- 对核子可乐上瘾（不可治愈）

original: Nuka Cola Addict
translation: 核子可乐上瘾者

original:
Born within the confines of a Vault, you spent the majority of your life oblivious to the world beyond your sheltered haven, protected from the radiation-scarred wasteland. Now, having stepped out of your Vault, you're striving to carve out an existence in the brutal reality above ground.

+ Increased Charisma and Intelligence when wearing Vault Suits
- Reduced Radiation Resistance
translation:
你出生在避难所内，一生中的大部分时间都对外面的世界浑然不觉，免受废土辐射的影响。现在你离开了避难所，努力在地面上的残酷现实中生存。

+ 穿着避难所制服时，魅力和智力增加
- 辐射抗性减少

original: Vault Dweller
translation: 避难所住民

original:
You are a missionary with the Church of the Children of Atom and were sent west to spread the good news of Atom's Light. While your proselytization efforts may not have gone exactly as planned, you nevertheless remain firm in your faith.

+ Start with Rad Child perk
- Reduced Strength and Endurance when
Rads fall below 50
translation:
你是原子之子教会的传教士，被派往西部传播原子的福音。你的传教之旅并非一帆风顺，但你的信仰依旧坚定。


+ 拥有“辐射小子”特长
- 辐射值低于50时力量和耐力降低

original: Child of Atom
translation: 原子之子

original:
When you were a small child, you fleed into a cave. Rather than eating you, the pack of coyotes raised alongside their pups. Although you feel at home in your den, it's obvious being raised by coyotes may have hindered your childhood development.

+ Allied with Coyotes
+ Visiting Coyotes Boosts your Max Health
- Reduced Base Intelligence and Charisma
translation:
你很小的时候掉进了郊狼洞，它们非但没有吃掉你，还把你和小狼们一起养大。尽管狼窝给了你家的温暖，但这也许抑制了你的童年发育。


+ 与郊狼友好
+ 接触郊狼增加你的最大生命值
- 基础智力和魅力降低

original: Raised by Coyotes
translation: 狼孩

original:
Although not officially part of the Legion, you have often worked for the Frumentarii on various assignments against the NCR whether it be gathering intel or sabotaging equipment. You have proven yourself to be a very valuable asset.

+ Accepted by the Legion
- Shunned by the NCR
translation:
尽管你并非凯撒军团的正式成员，你已经作为特务完成了多次针对NCR的任务：收集情报、破坏补给。你已经证明自己是一个非常有价值的人才。

+ 被军团接受
- 被NCR躲避

original: Frumentarii Asset
translation: 军团特务人才

original: You are a gladiator that fights in the Thorn. Although you have won some victories, you are still a stranger to the Thorn and have much to learn.\n\n+ Start with Hunter perk
translation: 你是一名荆棘街角斗士，尽管有不少胜绩，荆棘街的多数人仍不熟悉你。你还需要学习很多。\n\n+ 拥有“猎人”特长

original: Thorn Gladiator
translation: 荆棘街角斗士

original: Dogmeat has left for the 188 Trading Post.
translation: 狗肉已经前往188贸易站。

original: Dogmeat has left for the Lucky 38.
translation: 狗肉已经前往幸运38赌场。

original: You are a wanderer from the East, and you've already had your fair share of adventures in the wasteland. Hopefully, your time in the Mojave will be nice and quiet. No matter what happens, you have your faithful companion by your side.\n\n+ Start with Dogmeat as a companion
translation: 你从东部流浪而来，已经历了无数的冒险。但愿你在莫哈维的时光能给你些许安宁。无论如何，有一个忠实的伴侣在你身边。\n\n+ 狗肉作为同伴

original: Lone Wanderer
translation: 独行客

original: Dogmeat has given you the Lone Companion perk.
translation: 狗肉给予了你“独行伴侣”能力

original: Your parents were both Ex-Enclave. As a child, you remember constantly being on the run and having to hide your background. Other memories are of your father teaching you how to wear his rusty suit of power armor. If there were other Enclave survivors, you never heard about them. Now alone, you have to find your place in this new America.\n\n+ Start with Power Armor Training
translation: 你的父母都是前英克雷成员。逃亡占据了你的大部分童年记忆，还有父亲教你怎么穿戴他那生锈的动力甲。你不知道世上是否还有其它的英克雷残存者，现在，你必须独自一人在这个新美国找到自己的归宿。\n\n+ 动力装甲训练

original: Enclave Remnant
translation: 英克雷残存者

original:
Unlike other refugees from Navarro, you were never ashamed of your past. You're Enclave and you're proud! Only commies try to hide their colors, but you aren't afraid to wave the red, white, and blue.

+ Start with Power Armor Training
+ Start with Purifier perk
- Shunned by the NCR
- Shunned by the Brotherhood
translation:
与其它纳瓦罗的难民不同，你从不对过去的所作所为感到羞愧。你为自己英克雷的身份感到自豪！只有康米主义者才会隐藏自己的颜色，而你不惧于挥舞那面红、蓝、白旗。

+ 动力装甲训练
+ 拥有“净化者”特长
- 被NCR躲避
- 被兄弟会躲避

original: Enclave Patriot
translation: 英克雷爱国者

original:
Your Vertibird went down in the southern Mojave, but somehow you managed to pull yourself out of the wreckage. No one else survived, and the military robots you were carrying have all gone haywire. While you could probably salvage some supplies from the wreck, you're not sure it's worth the risk.

+ Start with Power Armor Training
- Injured with Crippled Limbs
translation:
你的飞鸟坠毁在莫哈维南部，只有你幸存。机上携带的军用机器人都已失控，你不知道是否该冒险回去抢救些补给。

+ 动力装甲训练
- 肢体伤残

original: Vertibird Crash Survivor
translation: 飞鸟坠毁幸存者

original:
You were asleep in your bed when the prisoners started revolting. A dynamite explosion jolted you right out of bed. Although you're not sure how it all happened, the next thing you knew, you were attacking the guards and fighting for your freedom. Now that the dust has settled, you have to decide whether to stick around with the Powder Gangers or wander out into the Mojave.

+ Accepted by Powder Gangers
- Shunned by the NCR
translation:
当狱友们暴动时，你还在睡梦中，爆炸将你震下了床。回过神来，你已经站在对抗狱卒的行列中了。如今尘埃落定，你必须决定是和火药帮一起留在这里，还是去外面碰碰运气。

+ 被火药帮接受
- 被NCR躲避

original: NCRCF Convict
translation: NCR惩戒所囚犯

original: You were hired by Jas to grab a Deathclaw egg from Quarry Junction. You figured that with a Stealth Boy, you would have no trouble sneaking into Quarry Junction and grabbing an egg. And you were right. Getting into the Quarry was easy, but now your Stealth Boy is about to die, and you're wondering if it has enough juice for you to get out alive.\n\n+ The Value of all Eggs is Doubled
translation: 你被雅斯·威尔金斯雇佣去采石场收集死亡爪的蛋。你以为一个隐身小子足以让你畅通无阻，你是对的---至少在你进去的时候。现在隐身小子即将失效，你不知道能否撑到活着离开。\n\n+ 所有蛋的价值翻倍

original: Egg-thusiast
translation: 蛋狂

original:
Your land was conquered by Caesar, and you along with the rest of your tribe were enslaved by the Legion. However, you were able to escape and fled across the Colorado River.

+ Start with the Travel Light Perk
- Shunned by Caesar's Legion
translation:
你的家园被凯撒征服，族人沦为奴隶。你设法逃脱，穿过科罗拉多河。

+ 拥有“轻装上阵”特长
- 被凯撒军团躲避

original: Escaped Slave
translation: 逃走的奴隶

original: You were sent West on a job. Now that the job is done, you figured you might as well stick around the Mojave some more and see if there is anymore work for you.\n\n+ Start with the Grunt perk
translation: 你被派往西方执行一项任务。如今任务完成，你可以在莫哈维再多逗留一阵，看看有没有更多事情可做。\n\n+ 拥有“大兵”特长

original: Reilly's Ranger
translation: 莱利的游骑兵

original:
When your tribe was conquered and enslaved by the Legion, you did what few in Arizona dared to think possible. You stood in defiance of Caesar and led a slave revolt. Although you and your comrades fought bravely, the revolt was violently put down, and you were forced to retreat across the Colorado River.

+ Start with Fight the Power perk
- Hated by Caesar's Legion
translation:
族人被军团征服、奴役，你敢为亚利桑那先，掀起了一场反对凯撒的奴隶起义。尽管你们奋勇作战，起义最终仍被残酷镇压，你不得不撤退到科罗拉多河对岸。

+ 拥有“对抗强权”特长
- 被凯撒军团厌恶

original: Spartacus
translation: 斯巴达克斯

original: You're a prospector by trade. You dig through ruins and loot the corpse of the old world. Rummaging through someone else's 200-year-old garbage might not be the most "prestigious" of work, but you never know what lost treasures you might find.\n\n+ Start with the Fortune Finder Perk
translation: 你是一个淘金客，在旧世界的废墟残骸中四处寻觅。翻遍已有200岁的垃圾大概并不是什么体面的工作，但谁知道你会找到什么失落的宝藏呢？\n\n+ 拥有“宝藏猎人”特长

original: Prospector
translation: 淘金客

original:
You served in the NCR army and during your tours of duty you made many friends. . . and also plenty of enemies. Since you were given your discharge papers, you've been trying to figure out what do with your life. After spending some time in California, the land that you fought and bleed for, you've ended up back in the Mojave. Only you know what brought you back.

+ Accepted by the NCR
- Shunned by Caesar's Legion
- Shunned by the Powder Gangers
- Shunned by the Great Khans
translation:
在NCR军队服役让你结交了很多朋友......以及敌人。如今你已退伍，未知的人生等在前方。在加利福尼亚待了一阵后，你决定返回莫哈维，只有你知道为什么。

+ 被NCR接受
- 被凯撒军团躲避
- 被火药帮躲避
- 被大汗帮躲避

original: NCR Trooper
translation: NCR士兵

original:
Boy, did you have a hot streak going for a while! You were winning caps hand over fist. You were on top of the world. You were the KING of the Strip. But then your luck took a turn . . . a really bad one. Somehow, you managed to lose all of your winnings. Technically, you still have the keys to the complimentary suites you won. Not that it does you much good since you've been thrown out of the Strip and onto your ass in Freeside. Still, you aren't banned from the Atomic Wrangler. It's not too late to turn your luck around.

+ Key to Casino Suites
- Banned from All Casinos on the Strip
- Shunned by the Strip
translation:
你小子的手气实打实地热了一阵！赢得大把瓶盖，仿佛处于世界之巅，你就是长街之王！直到你的运气急转直下......你输掉了所有赌资。尽管你还有各大赌场赠送的套房钥匙，但在被踢到自由城的当下也没用了。至少，你还没有被原子牛仔禁赌，转运为时不晚。

+ 拥有赌场套房钥匙
- 被长街的赌场禁赌
- 被长街躲避

original: Destitute Gambler
translation: 落魄赌徒

original: You're a simple fisherman who owns a shack on Lake Mead. It's not much, but it's a good life. Just watch out for Lakelurks in the water and cazadors in the hills.\n\n+ Fisherman's Pride Shack becomes a player home
translation: 你是个住在米德湖边的渔夫。日子虽不富裕，但也美好。只要盯着点湖沼蟹和山上的大毒蜂。\n\n+ 拥有渔家傲小屋

original: Fisherman
translation: 渔夫

original: When the Ranger Unification Treaty was signed back in '71, not every Desert Ranger opted to join the NCR. You are one of those few that rejected the treaty. Now you wander the Mojave alone, trying to remember what it means to be a Desert Ranger.\n\n+ Start with the Cowboy perk
translation: 当2271年的游骑兵统一条约签订时，一部分沙漠游骑兵没有选择加入NCR。现在你孤身漫游于莫哈维，试图找回最初成为沙漠游骑兵的意义。\n\n+ 拥有“牛仔”特长

original: Desert Ranger
translation: 沙漠游骑兵

original:
You know robots better than anyone and enjoy spending your days tinkering with them. Recently, you managed to repair a broken Eyebot who has since been faithfully floating by your side. Robots really are a man's best friend.

+ Start with Robotics Expert perk
+ Start with ED-E as companion
translation:
你比任何人都更了解机器人，享受着捣鼓它们的每一天。最近，你设法修好了一个绕着你转的破损的眼球机器人，啊，人类最好的朋友。

+ 拥有“机器人专家”特长
+ ED-E作为同伴

original: Robotics Expert
translation: 机器人专家

original:
You are the last remaining survivor of your Chapter. Your bunker was destroyed and buried in the sands, along with its history and knowledge. After finding a dead patrol, you managed to discover the bunker belonging to the Mojave Chapter. However, you are uncertain of the kind of welcome you will receive. In recent years, the Brotherhood of Steel has diminished in power, and the remaining Chapters scattered throughout the wastes grow ever more insular and isolated, viewing even Brothers born outside their bunker as "outsiders."

+ Power Armor Training
+ Accepted by the Brotherhood
- Shunned by the NCR
translation:
你是你们分部仅存的成员，你们的地堡已被摧毁，历史和知识被埋葬在风沙下。你发现了一名死去的兄弟会哨兵，设法追踪到了莫哈维分部的地堡，但你不确定他们是否会欢迎你。近年来，兄弟会的实力已经大大衰退，仅存的各分部都愈发孤立化，出生在其它地堡的人也被当做“外来者”。

+ 动力装甲训练
+ 被兄弟会接受
- 被NCR躲避

original: Brotherhood Survivor
translation: 兄弟会幸存者

original: You are a member of a Chinese spy cell that has been operating continuously in American territory since before the Great War. Even though contact with Beijing was lost long ago, the cell persists in its clandestine operations. Your superiors have now ordered you to travel to the Mojave for a top-secret mission.\n\n+ Start with the Silent Running perk
translation: 你是一个自核大战前就在美国活动的中国间谍机关的成员。尽管和北京之间的联系已经中断了很久，这个机关仍在运行。上级将你派往莫哈维执行一项绝密任务。\n\n+ 拥有“衔枚疾走”特长

original: Chinese Spy
translation: 中国间谍

original: Conversion, MFC to Alien Cells
translation: 转换，微型核聚变电池到外星电池

original: Conversion, ECP to Alien Cells
translation: 转换，电子充能包到外星电池

original: Nightstalker Squeezin's
translation: 夜行兽提取物

original: Conversion, SEC to Alien Cells
translation: 转换，小型能量电池到外星电池

original: The Tops Presidential Suite
translation: 九重天总统套房

original: Take Your Stuff
translation: 拿走你的东西
